name: TC-050: User enable autosave when have saved page

attachments.name: Open website with URL: https://admin.shopify.com/store/quynhquynhiee/apps/wip-pagefly/pages

steps.name: Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Wait for the page listing to be loaded

attachments.name: Get text of element By.xpath: //h1[@class='Polaris-Header-Title']
==> The Text is: Pages

steps.name: Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']
Create a new PAGE page from blank
Click on the element By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']

steps.name: Click on the element By.id: page-blank

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: page-blank

steps.name: Wait for the page to be loaded
Change the page title to Test PAGE Tue May 07 09:57:36 ICT 2024
Click on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

steps.name: Clear and Fill text on element not reachable by keyboard
Click on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

steps.name: Set text on text box and press key

attachments.name: Press key ENTER on keyboard
Clear and Fill Test PAGE Tue May 07 09:57:36 ICT 2024 on By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

steps.name: Click on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--save-page-btn

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--save-page-btn

steps.name: Verify text Save page of element [Contains] By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

attachments.name: Get text of element By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

==> The Text is: Save page
Once saved, the page will be ready for preview.
Please note that:
After saving, you have to publish the page to make it go live.
Page preview might differ from the live page due to your theme styling.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Save
Get text of element By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

==> The Text is: Save page
Once saved, the page will be ready for preview.
Please note that:
After saving, you have to publish the page to make it go live.
Page preview might differ from the live page due to your theme styling.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Save
Verify text of an element [Contains] : true
Clicked on the element By.xpath: .//*[@role='dialog']//button//*[text()='Save']

steps.name: Verify element NOT present [[ChromeDriver: chrome on mac (644481ef40e1f185e1280cd2f816fac1)] -> xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]]
Verify text Enable autosave? of element [Contains] By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

attachments.name: Get text of element By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

==> The Text is: Enable autosave?
Enabling autosave allows you to automatically save any changes made to the current page. Learn more
Autosaving will not create new versions in version history. To create one, you need to manually save your progress in the editor.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Enable
Get text of element By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

==> The Text is: Enable autosave?
Enabling autosave allows you to automatically save any changes made to the current page. Learn more
Autosaving will not create new versions in version history. To create one, you need to manually save your progress in the editor.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Enable
Verify text of an element [Contains] : true
Clicked on the element By.xpath: .//button//*[text()='Cancel']

steps.name: Verify element NOT present [[ChromeDriver: chrome on mac (644481ef40e1f185e1280cd2f816fac1)] -> xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]]

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--editor-setting--activator
Clicked on the element By.xpath: //label[@for="auto-save--enable"]
